short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Password generator chrome extension, to save you the hassle of finding generator sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin quickly spins up randomized passwords. You have the option to select how many characters the password should be, as well as if special characters are allowed.
